mean_cn: n.评价；等级评定；额定功率；评分
mean_en: a measurement of how good, popular, important, etc. somebody/something is, especially in relation to other people or things
sentence: We received an excellent rating for our customer service.
sentence_trans: 我们的客户服务得到了超赞的评价。
word_etyma: rat=calculate计算 + ing名词后缀，构成抽象名词 → rating等级
